QuestionText: Say the first article of faith: "We believe in God...."
Say the second article of faith: "We believe that men will...."
How many articles of faith are there?
Say the third article of faith: "We believe that through the Atonement...."
Say the fourth article of faith: "We believe that the first principles...."
Say the sixth article of faith. "We believe in the same organization...."
Say the eighth article of faith. "We believe the Bible to be..."
Say the fifth article of faith. "We believe that a man must...."
Say the seventh article of faith. "We believe in the gift of tongues...."
Say the ninth article of faith. "We believe all that God has...."
Say the tenth article of faith. "We believe in the literal gathering...."
Say the eleventh article of faith. "We claim the privilege of...."
Say the twelvth article of faith. "We believe in being subject...."
Give your best attempt at the thirteenth article of faith. "We believe in being honest, true, chaste...."
